title: Jazmin and Darryon's Story
description: Jazmin Hope Carter, a goth in her teens, a rebel at heart had never thought about falling in love. But things changed when a certain Darryon Haris entered her life. And she could only do what she did best- run. Six months later when she returns, she's surprised to find themselves in the same place. But did she really deserve a kindhearted man like Darryon? She didn't think so. In hopes of turning him away, Jazmin takes help from a friend. Little did she know that help would turn into trouble. A story of heartbreak and romance. A story of love- how it began, how it continued
author: Sylvester Murray
